text:
October 10, 1952
Mr. Frank Schooley, Treasurer
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Schooleyt
We have noted your advertisement on the “Jeffersonian
Heritage”.
I realize, of course that plans are undoubtedly
consummated as far as this series of records is
concerned, but did want to bring to you* attention our
recording service, which we believe will be of interest
to you.
We are enclosing a brochure which will cover the general
points of service, but would like to mention the fact
that transcription records can be produced in our
plant in Indianapolis. This central shipping point
would be a means of saving substantially on shipping
charges.
We hope that we may have the pleasure of handling some
of your future work.
Verytruly yours,
A. E. Hindle, Manager
RCA Recording Studios
Custom Record Sales Division
